Confirmation.Title: Confirmation
Confirmation.Message: Are you sure you want to {{action}}?
Confirmation.UnsavedChanges: You have unsaved changes that will be lost if you decide to continue. Are you sure want to leave?

FileUpload.OnlyAllowedFileType: You are allowed to only upload {{fileType}} file
FileUpload.FileTooLarge: File is too large. Maximum upload size is {{maxUploadSize}}
FileUpload.OnlyAllowedFileQuantity: You are allowed to only upload maximum {{quantity}} file(s)

Register.Agreement: By creating an account, you agree to the Terms of Service and Privacy Policy

ForgotPassword.Title: Forgot password
ForgotPassword.SubTitle: Enter your email address and we will send you instructions to reset your password
ForgotPassword.SentEmailSuccess: We've sent a link to your email with instructions to reset your password

PasswordReset.Title: Reset password
PasswordReset.SubTitle: Enter your new password for your account
PasswordReset.GoLoginWithNewPassword: You can now use your new password to login to your account
